title: VariableInstructionValidator
content:
CommentComponent(kind=text, text=Validator of , value=) CommentComponent(kind=typeName, text=VariableInstruction, value=kwasm.ast.instruction.VariableInstruction) CommentComponent(kind=text, text= nodes.

From

the docs:

, value=) CommentComponent(kind=typeName, text=VariableInstruction.LocalGet, value=kwasm.ast.instruction.VariableInstruction.LocalGet) CommentComponent(kind=text, text=

  • The local C.locals\[x] must be defined in the context.
  • Let t be the value type C.locals\[x].
  • Then the instruction is valid with type [] => \[t].

, value=) CommentComponent(kind=typeName, text=VariableInstruction.LocalSet, value=kwasm.ast.instruction.VariableInstruction.LocalSet) CommentComponent(kind=text, text=

  • The local C.locals\[x] must be defined in the context.
  • Let t be the value type C.locals\[x].
  • Then the instruction is valid with type \[t] => [].

, value=) CommentComponent(kind=typeName, text=VariableInstruction.LocalTee, value=kwasm.ast.instruction.VariableInstruction.LocalTee) CommentComponent(kind=text, text=

  • The local C.locals\[x] must be defined in the context.
  • Let t be the value type C.locals\[x].
  • Then the instruction is valid with type \[t] => \[t].

, value=) CommentComponent(kind=typeName, text=VariableInstruction.GlobalGet, value=kwasm.ast.instruction.VariableInstruction.GlobalGet) CommentComponent(kind=text, text=

  • The global C.globals\[x] must be defined in the context.
  • Let mut t be the global type C.globals\[x].
  • Then the instruction is valid with type [] => \[t].

, value=) CommentComponent(kind=typeName, text=VariableInstruction.GlobalSet, value=kwasm.ast.instruction.VariableInstruction.GlobalSet) CommentComponent(kind=text, text=

  • The global C.globals\[x] must be defined in the context.
  • Let mut t be the global type C.globals\[x].
  • The mutability mut must be var.
  • Then the instruction is valid with type \[t] => [].
, value=null)
